channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 09:31 Air anxiety in the Zhytomyr Oblast follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 09:31 Air anxiety in the Zhytomyr Oblast follow the following messages.#Zhytomyr_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 09:26 Drive alarm to Vinnytsia region. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 09:26 Drive alarm to Vinnytsia region. Watch for further messages.#Vinnytsia_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 09:11 The threat of shelling! Now in Marganets and Marhanetsky territorial community artillery shelling. Walk into shelter!

Consider that the alarm is still in:- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_.
